From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: Appendix:Variations of "make"

Finnish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Compare Jake, Kake.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /ˈmɑke/, [ˈmɑ̝k̟e̞]
  • Rhymes: -ɑke
  • Syllabification(key): Ma‧ke
  • Hyphenation(key): Ma‧ke

Proper noun

[edit]

Make

  1. a diminutive of the male given name Markus

Statistics

[edit]
  • The given name Make belongs to 16 male individuals, according to August 2025 data from the Digital and Population Data Services Agency of Finland.
